name: Beautiful passage way
description: This is a beautiful passage way with wonderful paintings on the walls  but alas it is only a passage way.  Please head west to continue your journey.

exits.description: You can not go back this direction.
You see beautiful paintings but you can not go this direction.

You see a wonderful mural but you can not go this direction.
